items.position: To What Extent Can the Below-Cloud Washout Effect Influence the PM2.5?
items.description: Developed a new below-cloud washout scheme with Python, using 7-year PM2.5 and meteorological data (in minutes), which improved the PM2.5 simulation accuracy by 41%.
